runs.comm: played towards cover where there's a misfield
defended towards short cover, they think of a single but decide against it
pushed past mid-on for a single
wide outside off, Hafeez reaches for it and cuts through point for the first boundary
another one, a rubbish full toss on leg stump  and Hafeez pulls to the midwicket boundary
defended back to the bowler
the batsman aims for a cover drive but mis-times it, the ball was on a good length outside off
too straight, nudged off the pads towards square leg
good length outside off with swing away from the right-hander, Hafeez lets it go
Hafeez inside-edges the drive on the leg side
guided towards third man for a single, a tight over so far from Jarvis
full ball outside off stump, driven towards mid-off
short ball and Shafiq dispatches it over deep backward square, behind the fielder
wider outside off this time and Shafiq drives to the fielder at cover
short of a length just outside off, the batsman opens the face and dabs towards short third man
full ball on middle and leg stump, flicked uppishly through square leg

caught at long-on! Ahafiq attempts to loft a length ball through the line, he hits it on the up and makes clean contact. He just doesn't get enough distance on the ball. Chigumbura takes a simple catch
a very slow ball on off stump, the batsman dabs towards the off side and calls for a single towards point
caught at short fine leg! Raja's attempt at pulling a short ball falls into Price's hands. The ball was on to him too quickly, he was late on the shot and a simple catch in the end
good length ball outside off stump, left alone by the batsman
played towards point from the crease
fuller ball in line with the stumps, Malik gets going by flicking wide of mid-on
a slower full toss, played towards mid-on once again
short of a length outside off, Malik tries to run it own to third man but gets beaten
defended on the front foot towards the bowler
Hafeez dabs the ball behind square and sprints the single
Price angles into middle and leg, Malik flicks to midwicket
Malik comes down the track, Price fires it quick and into the batsman, finding the gap between Malik's legs, the keeper fails to collect cleanly and make the stumping though
Malik moves towards the leg side and drives the ball inside out through extra cover, he hit that powerfully
and again, this time down the ground towards long-off
Hafeez tries to run the ball past short third man but gets an edge that falls short of the fielder
Malik stays in his crease and dabs the ball towards point
full ball outside off stump, Hafeez drives off the front foot towards mid-off, where the fielder runs and slides to his left
defended on the front foot, the bowler runs across the pitch to field
caught behind! That might have been wide had Malik not slashed at it. It was that far outside off stump. Malik went for it and cut hard, the ball bounced sharply and took the top edge to Taibu
terrific bowling, Akmal comes down the pitch first ball and then has to contend with a bouncer, he begins to fend and then sways out of the way
punched off the back foot towards long-on
tossed up slowly outside off, Hafeez tries to run it down to third man but is beaten
pushed off the back foot towards the bowler's right
played off the front foot to long-on
a bit wide outside off, cut to short third man
played to long-on for one more
that's short, and Hafeez goes quickly on to the back foot and pulls the ball into the gap on the square-leg boundary
nudged off the back foot towards midwicket
pushed off the front foot towards midwicket
Hafeez turns the ball towards short fine leg, Akmal begins to run but stops
a full toss, and Hafeez plays it towards long on for one more
driven back to the bowler from the crease
Hafeez brings up Pakistan's fifty by charging down the track, getting to the pitch of the ball and lofting it over long-on
defended towards the leg side
full toss outside off stump, hit to the fielder on the deep cover boundary
short and wide outside off, Hafeez cuts off the back foot towards deep point
poor line, on leg stump, Hafeez gets down on one knee and sweeps towards backward square. The fielder is in front of square so he has no chance
swept once again towards deep backward square, this time there's a fielder to stop it
bowled full on middle and off, defended by the batsman
Hafeez reaches out for one outside off and drives towards cover point
Akmal steps down the pitch and swats a wide one towards the fielder on the sweeper boundary
a full ball outside off stump, Hafeez reaches out for it and drives it through the gap at point
pushed off the front foot close on the off side
full toss again, a straighter one this time, driven to long-off
full length on middle and leg stump, clipped off the pads through square leg
full delivery on off stump, a slower one, Akmal waits in his crease and drives through cover
that short ball sat up for Hafeez to pull and he hit it along the ground to the fielder on the midwicket boundary
Akmal tries to blast the ball through cover but gets beaten outside off stump
a slower ball on middle and leg, played through square leg for one more
a slower full toss outside off stump, driven through cover point
good length on off stump, defended on the leg side
pushed towards point and Akmal sets off
full ball delivered from wide of the crease, Hafeez drives to long-off
driven in the air but wide of the diving fielder at cover
once again he goes wide of the crease to angle the ball into the right-hander, clipped off the pads through midwicket
a full toss, but it's driven back to the bowler
Akmal steps a long way out of his crease but is beaten by the flight, he plays it to long-on
Hafeez stays in his crease and pushes the ball towards point
Akmal steps out again, Utseya sees him coming and fires the ball into the pads and hits them
driven towards long-off for a single
Hafeez backs away towards leg and cuts the ball from leg stump through cover point
Akmal works the ball through square off the back foot
a slower ball outside off beats Akmal's attempt at driving through the off side
pulled from the crease through midwicket
full delivery angling into middle stump, driven towards long-on
a bouncer but it's mis-directed down leg side
Akmal moves outside leg to make room, the bowler follows him with a full ball, played towards long-on
once again Akmal makes room to hit to the off side but doesn't get it, he manages to flick the ball towards deep square

Hafeez drives the ball straight past the bowler, the fielders at long-on and long-off converge on it at the same time and they bump into each other while sliding. They manage to stop the boundary though
driven towards deep cover

caught on the edge of the long-on boundary! Hafeez got under the ball and lofted it high, extremely high. He nearly got enough distance on it, but nearly isn't enough, and Chigumbura settled under the ball a couple of feet inside the boundary
defended back towards the bowler
bowled short on middle stump, nudged off the back foot through midwicket
flicked from the crease behind square
exceptional over from Price, he runs to his right to field the last ball
short of a length and straight, the ball rises on Misbah who plays it down on the leg side and runs
Akmal stays on the back foot, rises to meet the short of a length ball with an open face and guide it towards short third man
the yorker just outside off stump, Misbah plays it towards short third man
full ball on middle stump, flicked from the crease towards deep square leg where there's a fumble, Pakistan reach 100
driven to long-off for one more
that's extremely wide down leg side, and even though Taibu dives full length to his left, he's no where near the ball
another wide ball down leg side, but did this clip the pad? The umpire seemed to think so. Taibu flew to his left to make a fine save
a slower ball and it's rather short, Akmal pulls off the back foot towards deep midwicket

another slower ball, fuller length on off stump, Akmal makes room and hits through the off side, he returns for the second but wasn't expecting the throw from Chigumbura at wide long-off to come to his end, he's well short, the third umpire isn't needed
defended on the front foot towards the off side
Misbah stays in his crease and works it behind square leg
Tanvir's heaved a short of a length delivery, high in the air towards deep square leg, which is unprotected
a slower ball, on a good length, Tanvir swings it towards deep midwicket
full ball outside off stump, Tanvir reaches for it and drives through cover point
full and straight, Misbah plays it towards midwicket
full and straight again, Tanvir swings across the line and misses, he was aiming for deep midwicket, he got nothing, Jarvis hits the stumps
played towards square leg
defended on the back foot towards point, but the fielders are on the edge of the inner circle
full ball on middle and leg stump, flicked towards long leg
full on leg stump, flicked off the pads towards deep backward square
played towards deep backward square once again
a slower ball, but it's a bit short and Misbah pulls towards wide long-on
wide ball down leg side
neither long-on nor long-off can cut this off! Another slower ball but Misbah was ready and waiting. He cleared his front foot and hammered the ball straight past the bowler
Misbah goes back and pulls a slower one towards deep square
short ball around off stump, Yasir Shah has space to free his arms and he swats the ball into the gap between deep midwicket and long-on
an accurate yorker, the batsman cannot do anything but defend

caught, after a collision. Misbah attempted to pull a short ball but only succeeded in top-edging the ball towards the short leg region. It was Taibu's catch but Jarvis went for it as well. They bumped into each other as the ball settled in Taibu's gloves
a slower full toss, the batsman makes room and hits towards long-off where a fumble allows the second
another full toss, Yasir tries to smash it through the off side but inside edges on to the pad, Jarvis cannot stop the single though
full ball on off stump, driven along the ground to the fielder at cover

terrific ball to end the innings, in the blockhole outside off stump, the batsman is beaten but Taibu fails to hits the stumps and concedes a bye. It's been given as a run, so maybe there was a bottom edge
